rule-22-16-a.test_description: The project has one building segment with two zones.  HVAC is system type 7 and the HeatRejection is correctly modeled with the wet-bulb and approach temperatures.  Expected result: PASS

standard.rule_description: The baseline condenser-water design supply temperature shall be calculated using the cooling tower approach to the 0.4% evaporation design wet-bulb temperature, valid for wet-bulbs from 55°F to 90°F.

rule-22-16-b.test_description: The project has one building segment with two zones.  HVAC is system type 7 and the HeatRejection is modeled with the incorrect wet-bulb and approach temperatures.  Expected result: FAIL

standard.rule_description: The baseline condenser-water design supply temperature shall be calculated using the cooling tower approach to the 0.4% evaporation design wet-bulb temperature, valid for wet-bulbs from 55°F to 90°F.

rule-22-16-c.test_description: The project has one building segment with two zones.  HVAC is system type 7 and the HeatRejection design_wetbulb_temperature < 55.  Expected result: Not Applicable

standard.rule_description: The baseline condenser-water design supply temperature shall be calculated using the cooling tower approach to the 0.4% evaporation design wet-bulb temperature, valid for wet-bulbs from 55°F to 90°F.

rule-22-16-d.test_description: The project has one building segment with one zone.  HVAC is system type 11.2 and the HeatRejection is correctly modeled with the wet-bulb and approach temperatures.  Expected result: PASS

standard.rule_description: The baseline condenser-water design supply temperature shall be calculated using the cooling tower approach to the 0.4% evaporation design wet-bulb temperature, valid for wet-bulbs from 55°F to 90°F.

rule-22-16-e.test_description: The project has one building segment with one zone.  HVAC is system type 11.2 and the HeatRejection is modeled with the incorrect wet-bulb and approach temperatures.  Expected result: FAIL

standard.rule_description: The baseline condenser-water design supply temperature shall be calculated using the cooling tower approach to the 0.4% evaporation design wet-bulb temperature, valid for wet-bulbs from 55°F to 90°F.

rule-22-16-f.test_description: The project has one building segment with one zone.  HVAC is system type 11.2 and the HeatRejection design_wetbulb_temperature > 95.  Expected result: Not Applicable

standard.rule_description: The baseline condenser-water design supply temperature shall be calculated using the cooling tower approach to the 0.4% evaporation design wet-bulb temperature, valid for wet-bulbs from 55°F to 90°F.
